txt.en: 'So many hungry soldiers at the king's tables! Just look at this mess. I don't see how I'll be able to clean it before we all leave for Dunharrow.\n\n'Do you have a spare moment to help me, [placeholder]? I can only imagine all the rats who'll take over in our absence.'
Witwyn is in Meduseld, the great hall of Edoras in Kingstead.\n\nYou should speak with Witwyn.
Witwyn has a large mess to clean up in Meduseld before the city empties out to make for Dunharrow.
'Thank you, [placeholder]! You have saved me a great deal of work.\n\n'You were a great help to me, and I'll not forget it soon.'
Messes can be found on the tables throughout Meduseld, the great hall of Edoras in Kingstead.\n\nYou should clean up messes left by the king's departure feast.
Cleaned up a messy table setting ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
